show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #26 Dallas Mount "The Value of Sweat Equity"
subtitle: #26 Dallas Mount "The Value of Sweat Equity"
summary:
Dallas Mount joins us again on the show to talk about how to have some of the hard conversations with your business partners.
